p: Second, there is no comparison of determinants of being UTD on influenza vaccines vs. other vaccines. This is an important research gap; that the 19-shot, 7-vaccine series (4:3:1:3:3:1:4) uptake rate is comparable to the recent 2018/2019 single-season peak in influenza vaccine uptake in young children indicates unique mechanisms affect parentsâ€™ decisions to vaccinate their child against influenza relative to every other routinely-recommended childhood vaccine.
